title: ICAR Jobs 2017 – Walk in for SRF/ RA Posts

organizations.name: agricultural engineering & agricultural economics/ agricultural statistics
& environmental management and agricultural process engineering
post harvest engineering/ agricultural process engineering/ food engineering/ food science and technology/ foods & nutrition/ agri-business management
post harvest engineering/ agricultural process engineering/ food engineering/ food science and technology/ foods& nutrition/ agri business management
veterinary sciences in veterinary public health/ vety

text:
1. SRFs under CDDL – Sponsored Program on Avian Influenza: 04 Posts 2. SRF under Outreach Programme on Zoonotic Disease: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates maximum age should be 35 years for men and 40 years for women as on the date of interview. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Master’s degree in Veterinary Microbiology/ Vety. Virology/ Vety. Biotechnology/ Vety. Pathology/ Vety. Public Health or Master’s degree in Biotechnology/ Microbiology or M.Tech degree in Biotechnology with 4 years of B.Tech degree for S.No-1, Master of Veterinary Sciences in Veterinary Public Health/ Vety. Microbiology/ Vety. Pathology/ Vety. Virology/ Vety. Medicine for S.No-2. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates send their application through e-mail to (techcell@ hsadl.nic.in) & application in the prescribed format along with recent passport size photograph, attested copies of certificates of educational qualifications/ experience etc by post to Sr. Admn. Officer, NIHSAD, Bhopal on or before 06-02-2016. 
Important Dates: Last Date for Submission of Application: 06-02-2016. Tentative Date of Interview: 3rd week of February, 2017. For more details like duration, emoluments, desirable qualification & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Corrigendum ICAR Jobs 2017 – Walk in for Senior Research Fellow Posts: Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR) has issued a notification for the recruitment of Senior Research Fellow vacancies in Agricultural Engineering & Agricultural Economics/ Agricultural Statistics purely on contractual basis. Eligible candidates may attend for walk in interview on 06-02-2017 at 09.30 AM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… ICAR Vacancy Details: Name of the Post: Senior Research Fellow 1. Agricultural Engineering: 02 Posts 2. Agricultural Economics/ Agricultural Statistics: 02 Posts Age Limit: Candidates upper age should be 35 years for male & 40 years for female candidates as on the date of walk in interview. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Master degree in Farm Machinery and Power, Agricultural structure & Environmental Management and Agricultural Process Engineering etc. with 4 years/ 5 years of Bachelor degree, post graduation degree in basic sciences with 3 years Bachelor degree and 2 years master’s degree shall have NET qualification for for S.No-1 & Master degree in Agricultural Statistics, Agricultural Economics, Agricultural Business Management etc.with 4 years/ 5 years of Bachelor degree, post graduation degree in basic sciences with 3 years Bachelor degree and 2 years master’s degree shall have NET qualification for S.No-2. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may attend for walk in interview with an application, attested copies of all relevant certificates, age proof and NOC from present employer, if applicable & original certificates on 06-02-2017 at 09.30 AM. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 06-02-2017 at 09.30 AM. Venue: Office of the Dr. Devinder Dhingra, Agricultural Engineering Division, Room No. 411, Krishi Anusandhan Bhawan-II, PUSA, New Delhi – 110012. For more details like desirable criteria, place of posting, vacancies & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt – ICAR Jobs 2017 – Walk in for SRF/ RA Posts: Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR) has issued a notification for the recruitment of Senior Research Fellow/ Research Associate vacancies on contractual basis. Eligible candidates may attend for walk in interview on 30-01-2017 at 09.30 AM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… ICAR Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 02 Name of the Post: Senior Research Fellow/ Research Associate Age Limit: Candidates upper age should be 35 years for male & 40 years for female for SRF, 40 years for male & 45 years for female candidates for RA as on the date of walk in interview. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Ph.D in Post Harvest Engineering/ Agricultural Process Engineering/ Food Engineering/ Food Science and Technology/ Foods& Nutrition/ Agri Business Management or Master’s degree in relevant discipline with 4 years/ 5 years of Bachelor’s Degree having first division or 60% marks or equivalent grades with at least 02 years of research experience for RA & Ph.D in Post Harvest Engineering/ Agricultural Process Engineering/ Food Engineering/ Food Science and Technology/ Foods & Nutrition/ Agri-Business Management or Master’s degree in relevant discipline with 4 years/ 5 years of Bachelor’s degree for SRF. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply : Eligible candidates may attend for walk in interview with an application, attested copies of all relevant certificates, originals on 30-01-2017 at 09.30 AM. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 30-01-2017 at 09.30 AM. Venue: Office of Dr. Devinder Dhingra, Agricultural Engineering Division, RoomNo.411, KRISHI ANUSANDHAN BHAWAN-II, PUSA, New Delhi-110012. For more details like emoluments, qualification, place of posting, experience & other information click on the link given below….
